captions.text:
Because playing at Barcelona has been my 
dream since I was very young...

When I got here and 
saw all the players I thought...

I had not realised, you know. Up to this day I 
haven't! Sometimes... But it has been great!

Up to this day, every now and then 
I look and think "Is this real?"
In the changing room?
Yes... Man, it is as if you were inside a video game...

I have always played with them 
[on the video game]! Xavi, Messi...

You look to the side and there is 
Xavi, look the other way and see Valdes, Messi...
So I say "Hey, I walked into the playstation..."
Hello!
You have to distract him until everyone gets ready.
Daddy is here!
Who is taking the picture?
Ah, you losers!
I said you should come from there!
Because my brother is a protective person you know?
He likes to shelter people.

He is a very good friend, so even if 
half the people he loves is here...

When the boys come, when my mum 
comes or when everyone is here,
like today, ah, we get so happy!

Because, wanting or not, we bring 
his old routine here.
Its seems like...doesn't seem, he is at home!

It is very hard to find a gift to NJr, he 
has almost everything so...

We are growing the structure we had 
in Brazil, here, now....
A boat!
We brought his boat!
It is like yours!
Feeling at home already!
This one as well?
This is the one he wanted!
Wait, there is one more!
Ah, mum!
A day to remember!
Like this, with your head and POW!
With your head and...!

- With your head!
- With your head POW!

Whoever is back there won't be in 
the picture. Move forward!
Whoever is short come to the front!
The champagne!

There's no time!
Where's the champagne?
How much time?
Peace and love for all of us!
